text: I have learned something about unicode and think it's great.  But one thing that I havent' figured out is how to subscript a greek letter, say `c_\alpha`.  Can someone help me figure this out?

elements.text: I have learned something about unicode and think it's great.  But one thing that I havent' figured out is how to subscript a greek letter, say
.  Can someone help me figure this out?

text: Only a few characters are supported in subscripts. Type `\_<tab><tab>` at the repl to see which.

elements.text: Only a few characters are supported in subscripts. Type
at the repl to see which.

text: For example, `\_gamma<tab>` gives you a subscript gamma
Good to know, so you can't do what I was hoping to do.  I can certainly work around it

elements.text: Good to know, so you can't do what I was hoping to do.  I can certainly work around it

text: We want to enable this, but it requires Unicode support

elements.text: We want to enable this, but it requires Unicode support

text: Thanks <@U6740K1SP> and I'm happy to know that this is on the wish list.  I left a comment saying that I think it's a great idea.  Hopefully others will too
